279 Harvard St. (at Beacon St.) • 617-566-6660

I came in for one thing.

written for last week’s Staff Talent Show


<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">The store is stuffed with mounds of merch.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">The people come, and oh, they search.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">A Scrabble mug. A picture frame.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">That book. You know, by what’s-her-name.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">They come with varied goals in mind,</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">exceeded by the things they find.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Who knew how many pins they’d need?</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Who knew how much they had to read?</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Who knew a ring could tell their mood?</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Who knew their mood was “wanting food.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Yes, cookies. Yes, the kind by Tate’s.”</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">They need a planner, for their dates</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">are filling fast. They’re busy bees.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">They’d best relax. They need some teas</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">to drink while watching Game of Thrones,</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">a show that frustrates with unknowns…</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">unless they cheat and read ahead.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">But who has time for weddings red?</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">They’d better get a magazine.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">And just because they’re past eighteen</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">can’t mean the grownup books are urgent.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Look! John Green! And look! Divergent!</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Look! Nostalgia! Goodnight Moon!</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Isn’t someone’s kid due soon?</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Trees that gave and trains that could.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Those books were their childhood.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Wimpy kids and half-blood gods.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Boston books? What stunning odds!</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">A spinner sorted, slot by slot.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">(I hope and dream. It’s all I’ve got.)</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">There’s Parenting and Health and Psych</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">and travel guides by train or bike.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">That bargain book may not last long.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">To pass it up would just be wrong.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">And who could skip the plates and bowls?</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Not those with culinary goals</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">that match the cookbooks perfectly—</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">the kosher to the gluten-free.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Five months till Christmas! None to waste!</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Find books for every reading taste,</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">though friends can be persnickety.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Who won’t inhale the Picketty?</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Knausgaard wrote about his struggle.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Rowling wrote about a muggle.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Stacks of Books We Love, and each</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">might be useful for the beach.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Almost out, but wait, there’s more!</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Stairs reveal another floor.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">All the books they’ve meant to read,</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">used! A worthy deal indeed.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">And while they soothe their reader-shame,</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">they spot a favorite author’s name.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">She’s coming on a looming eve!</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Yeah, they’ll come back. Or just not leave.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">But—sigh—the rest of life awaits.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">They must ascend. (And buy more Tate’s.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">And mini-books. And chocolate bars.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">And bags for schlepping to their cars.)</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">They think, “I might as well. I’m here.”</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Impulsive? Sure. But they are dear </div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">to we who fill the waiting shelves.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">They never need explain themselves.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">So let your basket overflow.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="line-height: 200%; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">‘Cause would we ever judge you? NO!</div>
